评论概述: So Fun - Delivered with care and clean!
评论详情: Arrived cleanly with items individually wrapped.  Dress light & a little stretchy i ordered a size up in Large 5'7" 145-150 lbs; for 70's themed birthday party. Saw this vendor and they had glasses too!  Other provider did not.  Very happy with purchase will now order for others as we are dressing as a group.

评论概述: Great dress, accessories are just okay
评论详情: I went to a 70s inspired event at a local museum in this dress and accessories. I got SO many compliments! LOTS of kind comments.  The dress is cute, comfortable, and well made considering the cost. The dress itself is cool enough to warrant 5-stars for the whole package. The glasses, necklace, and earrings aren't great, but they're fine and suit the dress.  I'm between a 1X and 2X right now, and the XXL fits great. I worried about the fit since I ordered it late and it arrived the day of the event. It fit perfectly.

评论概述: Form fitting 60’s dress is very cute

I was going to purchase this product and something happened with the shipping but I do know that it is the cutest thing on especially with white boots. I work for a hotel and saw this at a convention and it is adorable.

What a bargain! I purchased this 70’s themed dress in the pink color way for a 70’s themed party. The dress is so comfortable and came looking exactly like the online description. ! I’m 5’3 and 145 lbs. I purchased a medium (fit a tad too snug for my liking, and ultimately went with the large). It fits great! The dress and matching tying headband are made of the same stretchy material, and it’s unbelievably comfortable. The dress has great stretch, seems to be made with good quality material, and is lightweight and breathable. The earrings, necklace and glasses seem to be made with less quality material, but definitely help complete the look! 10/10 would recommend this to anyone looking for an inexpensive costume.

I got this for a 70's themed Mother's Day event at my sons' preschool. I even wore it to work after and got a ton of compliments! It's a great value for money and the dress itself was really comfortable and flattering.. not to low cut and not too high on the legs. The accessories are typical Halloween accessories but didn't look terrible at all. I highly recommend!

评论概述: Cute and comfortable dress for casual wear
评论详情: I didn't get this dress for a costume. I got this dress because I like the print and I dig the vibe. The colors are bright and pretty against the ink black background. It's comfortable to wear as well, I'd totally wear this for a quick trip to the grocery store or post office. The XLarge is in my opinion about a size 6-8 (maybe a small 10) US, depending on whether you like your dress snug or loose fit. Except for the sash, the accessories do look and feel like costume jewelry. All in all a cute comfy casual dress. A+

I was invited to a Halloween costume party last year and had nothing to wear, so this year I decided I would be ready!  But, what to wear for a busy Mom that isn't quite the slender little thing I once was, wants something easy that involves no masks or face paint, and doesn't want it to look as though it came from the bottom of the donation  clearance bin?Enter this adorable 70's outfit.  I couldn't have asked for anything better in this price range.It fits very well, is comfortable, and the accessories are a really nice touch.I love it, and now I am ready for Halloween, or any costume party!  Definitely recommend!
Great value; nice material & accessories; cute enough for wearing daily - not just for a costume!
This dress is true to size It's pretty well made for a costume type outfit. It'll be great if you go on cruises for Saturday night or just for Halloween It's really cute I like it.

This is such a pretty outfit. I was looking for a 70s costume party outfit so I ordered this one. The package includes a long sleeves dress, headband, earrings, glasses, and necklace. The dress is bright and colorful. It is stretchable, easy to wear, fitting is good. Floral earrings are lightweight and look cute with this outfit.  Although I am not a fan of string necklaces with this set it goes very well together. Overall I am happy with it.

This is a very cute costume with most of the needed accessories. She's just going to need to get some go-go boots! My 12 year old daughter is wearing this costume for Halloween. The only drawback is that she doesn't have pierced ears, so we wish the earrings were clip-on so that she could wear them.  I noticed the comment on the description about a slim fitting dress. She's 5'3" and about 88 lbs. I would normally order and adult XS or S for her but decided to go with medium on this costume. I'm guessing small may have been okay, but the medium looks good. She's not swimming in it.
This is the perfect outfit for a quick hippie look. The dress isn’t too short and fits nicely. The color combination really pops. And it’s quite comfortable too.
